title: CTF Challenges
description: Custom CTF challenges under 5 different catagories with walkthroughs and flags.

title: Event registration management platform
description: A simple web app for event registration. Comes with an admin dashboard for adding, updating and deleting events. Lets users to register, login, navigate and add events to their dashboard.

title: Blog Platform
description: Built using MERN stack. Lets users register,post their blogs and follow other authors

title: Weather App
description: Provides weather forecast with an interval of 3 hours for next 5 days.Lets users register and add location preferences

title: Cybersecurity Blogs
description: Explores different areas of Reverse Engineering,Binary Exploitation

title: API Gateway
description: A simple implementation of API gateway using node Js. Add all the names and respective URL of the web apps in AppRegistry.json file. A simple UI lets the user to select a web app . The web app preference is set as a cookie in user's browser and sent to the gateway with future requests. Gateway acts as a proxy and forwards the request to the particular web server
